org.jboss.windup.reporting.ruleexecution

Class RuleExecutionResultsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.reporting.ruleexecution.RuleExecutionResultsListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleLifecycleListener

    public class RuleExecutionResultsListener
extends Object
implements RuleLifecycleListener
    Manages recording the history of Rules executed by Windup.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler, Ondrej Zizka
